name: Cleverman
description: Cleverman is dystopian sci-fi with a difference. With a predominantly Indigenous cast and senior crew, the series explores Aboriginal origin stories in a contemporary context, while examining themes of class, racism and power.

key_work.title: Cleverman character design
key_work.creator_credit: Ryan Griffen, Goalpost Pictures and Jacob Nash
key_work.brief_description: Stories of the “hairy man” are told by countless First Peoples across Australia and were used as the basis for the visionary dystopian sci-fi show Cleverman, which reimagined the Hairy people (known as ‘Hairies’ in the show) as heroes harassed and hunted by the government.

start.title: Queen & Slim

links.description: Based on the graphic novel Polar: Came From The Cold (2012), the highly-stylised action movie starred Mads Mikkelsen as a retired assassin marked for termination. Arguably Denmark’s most prominent actor, Mikkelsen also appeared in the debut film from another Danish creative: Pusher (2016) by Nicolas Winding Refn.

end.brief_description: Sam Bridges must brave a world utterly transformed by the Death Stranding. Carrying the disconnected remnants of our future in his hands, he embarks on a journey to reconnect the shattered world one step at a time.

links.description: Mikkelsen is considered a muse of Nicolas Winding Refn’s, starring in four of his early films including his first, Pusher (1996). Groundbreaking Japanese video game creator Hideo Kojima also looked to Mikkelsen for character inspiration in the game Death Stranding (2019), in which he plays a pivotal role.
